translation.en: [reporter] Tonight, all roads lead to Turbine Hall…
translation.de: Heute sind alle Augen die auf Turbine Hall gerichtet…

translation.en: [reporter] ...where Joburg's high-society will witness the reveal of the first "Face of Bhengu Beauty,"
translation.de: …wo Johannesburgs High Society das Gesicht von Bhengu Beauty kennenlernt,

translation.en: voted for by the public online.
Mogul Don Bhengu is expected to make a speech about these new changes
translation.de: Mogul Don Bhengu spricht in einer Rede über diese Neuigkeiten

translation.en: and the future of the Bhengu Beauty empire.
I don't care that the partners want equity. -Draw up the papers! -[glass clinks]
translation.de: Mir ist egal, was die Partner fordern. Setzen Sie den Vertrag auf!

translation.en: This expansion is happening on Don Bhengu's terms.
translation.de: Ich gebe die Bedingungen dieser Expansion vor.

translation.en: End of story.
Jesus! I can talk to the Kenyans, Ngcolosi.
The last time I went to Nairobi they were putty in my hands.
translation.de: In Nairobi fraßen sie mir aus der Hand.

translation.en: The new face of Bhengu must have mass appeal. [in Sotho] They won’t need equity to make money…
translation.de: Das Gesicht von Bhengu muss polarisieren. Sie brauchen kein Kapital…

translation.en: [in English] Save that enthusiasm for telling the maid how to clean, Grace.
translation.de: Spar dir den Enthusiasmus für unsere Putzfrau, Grace.

translation.en: [in Sotho] I know you’re natural-born rubbish, Thando.
[in English] Don't make it worse with your drinking.
Excuse me?
You had to be carried out at the minister's party.
translation.de: Beim Fest des Ministers trug man dich raus.

translation.en: [in Sotho] You disgraced our husband and the Bhengu name.
translation.de: Du hast unseren Mann und dem Namen Bhengu geschadet.

translation.en: [in English] Please, Grace, I was fine. You're the one that--
translation.de: Bitte, Grace, mir ging's gut. Du hast…

translation.en: Don't make excuses for being low-class.
Tonight is about dignity.
Have some.
-And smile. -Enough.
You know, I can't believe they've got us here handing out goodie bags to guests.
translation.de: Unglaublich, dass wir Geschenktüten verteilen müssen.

translation.en: I should be the face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.de: Ich sollte das Gesicht von Bhengu sein.

translation.en: [woman] I know, right. This Zinhle girl isn't even a real model.
translation.de: Genau. Zinhle ist nicht mal ein echtes Model.

translation.en: And that's why you shouldn't allow the public to vote for the face of Bhengu.
translation.de: Deshalb sollte auch nicht die Öffentlichkeit darüber abstimmen.

translation.en: Imagine being able to live with the Bhengu's. Getting your own car, getting to know Grace.
translation.de: Stell dir vor, bei den Bhengus zu wohnen. Ein eigenes Auto, Grace kennenlernen.

translation.en: [gasps] Even chilling with Phila Bhengu.
-Now you see that? -Oh my gosh. That's a different story.
translation.de: Das ist noch mal was ganz anderes.

translation.en: -Oh, he's so hot! -He's so hot!
Oh, my God.
[woman 2] I'll tell him you say hi.
Let's go.
Shit! I have to go.
You guys just order whatever you want to, it's on me.
translation.de: Bestellt ruhig, was ihr wollt. Geht auf mich.

translation.en: Zinhle, where are you?
Oh my God, you're doing my job again.
translation.de: Meine Güte, du erledigst wieder meine Arbeit.

translation.en: It's just a little foundation, Sisi.
My foundation, darling.
-But I like doing it. -That's okay, I'm fine with it.
translation.de: -Ich mache das gern. -Schon gut. Das stört mich nicht.

translation.en: [reporter] Past faces of Bhengu Beauty
translation.de: Frühere Gesichter von Bhengu Beauty waren Supermodels,

translation.en: have been supermodels, actresses, and celebrities.
translation.de: Frühere Gesichter von Bhengu Beauty waren Supermodels, Schauspielerinnen und Stars.

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty faced harsh criticism over their overly-edited images
translation.de: Es gab oft Kritik an Bhengu Beauty wegen der bearbeiteten Fotos,

translation.en: encouraging unrealistic standards of beauty.
Some wonder if the choice to go with an unknown face
translation.de: Fragt sich nur, ob ein unbekanntes Gesicht

translation.en: signals real change at Bhengu Beauty or is it simply lip service?
translation.de: eine wirkliche Veränderung oder nur ein Lippenbekenntnis ist.

translation.en: But as we can see tonight, even though the public was asked to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.de: Obwohl das Gesicht von Bhengu Beauty öffentlich gewählt wurde, sehen wir,

translation.en: the only guests here are an elite bunch.
translation.de: dass alle Gäste der Oberschicht angehören.

translation.en: And now it seems Mr. Bhengu and his two wives have arrived.
translation.de: Gerade sind Mr. Bhengu und seine Ehefrauen eingetroffen.

translation.en: -Mr. Bhengu? -Hey, Angela. [chuckles]
[in Xhosa] I told you Angela's not welcome at Bhengu events.
translation.de: Angela hat bei unseren Events nichts verloren.

translation.en: [in English] She's a very powerful journalist, what she says goes. This is big.
translation.de: Sie ist eine angesehene Journalistin. Das ist gut für uns.

translation.en: So, Dad, what do you think?
translation.de: Also, Dad, wie gefällt es dir?

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Excellent job, my girl. [in English] Don't stress!
translation.de: Sehr gute Arbeit, meine Kleine. Mach dir keine Sorgen!

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Have some champagne and meet some nice girls.
translation.de: -Trink was und lern nette Frauen kennen. -Papa!

translation.en: [in English] The walls could have been bigger.
Of course, Grace.
You did great, Linda.
translation.de: Du hast das toll gemacht, Linda.

translation.en: [man] This way for a photo.
Sorry I'm late.
Why do you insist on looking like a garden boy, Ndumiso?
translation.de: Wieso läufst du wie ein Gärtner herum, Ndumiso?

translation.en: -Come on, Ma. -Smile.
[in Xhosa] We’re taking the family photo with or without Phila.
translation.de: Wir machen das Familienfoto mit oder ohne Phila.

translation.en: -[in English] Hi, fam. -[Don] You're late.
I made it with five minutes to spare.
translation.de: Ich hätte sogar noch fünf Minuten.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Let's do this.
[in English] Bhengu smile.
[Don] That's baby number what?
[Grace] Six.
[in Xhosa] Where’s your baby number one?
[in English] Mr. Bhengu, quick question, please.
translation.de: Mr. Bhengu, ich hätte eine kurze Frage.

translation.en: Why ask the public to vote for the face of Bhengu Beauty
translation.de: Wieso durfte das Volk über das Gesicht abstimmen,

translation.en: but not have them at this event?
You sure your company's committed to the things you speak about?
translation.de: War das nur eine leere Geste Ihres Unternehmens?

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Reserve your questions until after the launch.
translation.de: Warten Sie mit den Fragen bis nach dem Event.

translation.en: [in English] And then you can be the judge.
[in Xhosa] She's always asking unnecessary questions.
[Thando in English] This is stunning, Linda.
-[Ndu] Well done. -[Linda] Thanks!
[Phila] How much did this cost?
[Linda in Xhosa] No, don’t ask too many questions.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
put your hands together for the CEO of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.de: einen Applaus für den Geschäftsführer von Bhengu Beauty,

translation.en: If you told me 15 years ago that, uh…
translation.de: Hätte man mir vor 15 Jahren gesagt,

translation.en: Bhengu Beauty would become one of the biggest beauty companies in the country,
translation.de: Bhengu Beauty wäre eins der größten Kosmetik-Unternehmen des Landes,

translation.en: soon Africa,
I would have told you,
"You are absolutely right!"
Yes!
I built this company with my own bare hands.
translation.de: Ich habe dieses Unternehmen mit bloßen Händen aufgebaut.

translation.en: No political connections, no capital,
no help whatsoever.
But tonight…
tonight we are here to unveil the new face of Bhengu Beauty.
translation.de: Heute enthüllen wir das neue Gesicht von Bhengu Beauty.

translation.en: I left the choice to a public vote because
translation.de: Ich überließ die Entscheidung der Öffentlichkeit, da ich einer Person eine Chance geben wollte,

translation.en: I wanted to provide an opportunity to someone who reminds me of myself,
translation.de: da ich einer Person eine Chance geben wollte, die mich an mich selbst erinnert, bevor ich dieser Don Bhengu wurde.

translation.en: before I became the Don Bhengu.
translation.de: die mich an mich selbst erinnert, bevor ich dieser Don Bhengu wurde.

translation.en: Someone without privilege,
someone unvarnished, an underdog to represent us all.
translation.de: die authentisch ist und uns alle repräsentiert.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen…
ushering in a new dawn as the newest face of Bhengu Beauty,
translation.de: …als das neue Gesicht von Bhengu Beauty leitet sie eine neue Ära ein,

translation.en: What the hell?
[in Sotho] Linda! Go fix it.
[in English] Now. Now. Go. Go.
Looks like Bhengu Beauty hasn't changed its colors after all.
translation.de: Offenbar hat Bhengu Beauty seine Farben nicht geändert.

translation.en: [Ndu] Hey.
I could get you something a little stronger if you like.
translation.de: Ich kann dir auch was Stärkeres holen.

translation.en: [Don in Xhosa] What nonsense is this?
Now we look like fools.
[Grace] Let's take this home. [Don] Damn it.
Everyone’s going to call us hypocrites.
[in English] Ndu, take Zinhle to the car.
-How did this-- -Why must I repeat myself. Just do it.
[in Xhosa] Did you mess this up? You too busy partying?
translation.de: Warst du das? Zu viel gefeiert?

translation.en: [Phila in English] I didn't do this!
I specifically told the designers to not change her complexion.
translation.de: Ich sagte, sie sollen nichts am Teint ändern.

translation.en: -Everything was perfect when I-- -Obviously not!
We're trying to show we're not stuck in the past -and what do-- -[Linda] I'll fix it!
translation.de: -Wir wollen uns modern zeigen, und du… -Ich regele das!

translation.en: I'll get to the bottom of this. Listen…
translation.de: Ich gehe der Sache auf den Grund.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] I’m sorry.
I’m sorry.
[in English] Get Peter to bring the car.
[Don in Xhosa] This is a disaster.
The driver could have brought me.
translation.de: Der Fahrer hätte mich mitnehmen können.

translation.en: [scoffs] No, I don't mind. Yeah. [clears throat]
This is all going blow over in like a day or two.
translation.de: In ein, zwei Tagen ist das alles vergessen.

translation.en: You'll see for yourself.
I don't know how anyone could be so negligent. You know?
translation.de: Wie kann man nur so nachlässig sein?

translation.en: Okay, let me.
It's okay. I can do it.
Yeah. Okay.
I bet this has never happened to Naomi Campbell.
translation.de: Naomi Campbell ist das sicher nie passiert.

translation.en: Oh no, actually it has. I once helped her out just like this.
translation.de: Doch, ist es. Ihr half ich auch schon mal so raus.

translation.en: I'm joking. I've never met her. [laughs]
translation.de: War ein Witz. Ich traf sie nie.

translation.en: Very funny.
Give me your hand.
-Okay… -Okay.
There you go.
This…
-Of course. -For you.
Thank you.
You'll get your jacket tomorrow.
translation.de: Deine Jacke gebe ich dir morgen.

translation.en: [Ndu] Sure.
[Don] Damn it.
Twitter is abuzz.
Ah, yeah, well, Linda will figure out what happened,
translation.de: Ja, Linda wird herausfinden, was passiert ist,

translation.en: and we will do what we do best. We will handle it.
translation.de: und wir werden das wie immer hinbiegen.

translation.en: Relax, old man.
[Thando] Actually, I'm going to my room.
No, you stay exactly where you are. I need everyone here.
translation.de: Nein, du bleibst. Ich brauche alle hier.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Regina, call Zinhle.
[in English] I need a double.
Thando will do it.
You can see your favorite son is already doing it.
I'll have a Chardonnay.
What a fuck-up.
[in Zulu] Dad. [in English] As I said, we will handle it.
translation.de: Papa, wie gesagt, wir bringen das in Ordnung.

translation.en: My people are already tweeting in our favor.
translation.de: Meine Leute twittern positiv für uns.

translation.en: -[Thando] Do you want a drink? -Yeah.
There you are, Zinhle.
-[in Sotho] Any journalists called you? -No, Mam' Grace.
If they do, no comment.
[in English] That goes for all of you.
PR is coming over,
and we're going to say it was a technical malfunction. Get it?
translation.de: Wir schieben es auf eine technische Störung, verstanden?

translation.en: End of story.
You can go.
[Grace] Yes.
[in Sotho] Do you remember that I still need to go to my cousin's after-funeral cleansing?
translation.de: Ich muss noch zur Leichenwaschung meiner Cousine.

translation.en: [in English] Your cousin is not family, Zinhle.
The events company messed up the images. They can't explain what happened.
translation.de: Die Veranstalter haben es vermasselt. Sie haben keine Erklärung.

translation.en: -[Grace] Linda, that's not good enough. -I know that, Grace.
translation.de: -Linda, das reicht nicht. -Das weiß ich, Grace.

translation.en: Okay, that's why I fired them.
-[Don] Good night. -Ahem. Good night.
Dad, is there anything I…
[Don] No, you've already done enough.
Thando?
[in Sotho] What did I say to you about your sulking in public?
translation.de: Was habe ich dir wegen des Schmollens in der Öffentlichkeit gesagt?

translation.en: [in English] I'm so sorry.
Drink, Mom?
No thanks, and put that down. No more drinking for you.
translation.de: Nein, danke. Und du trinkst auch nichts mehr.

translation.en: -Yes, definitely not. -You called?
[sighs] We need to talk.
[Zinhle] Your favorite.
-Really? -Mm-hmm.
[in Zulu] To be honest…
[in English] I should be getting you chocolates after the day you had.
translation.de: Nach dem Tag hättest du Pralinen verdient.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Are you okay?
[in English] It was weird seeing my face like that, as though it was bleached or something.
translation.de: Es war seltsam, mein Gesicht so blass zu sehen, aber…

translation.en: [in Zulu] But I'm okay.
I'm sorry.
[in English] How much damage do you think this will do to Bhengu Beauty?
translation.de: Wie viel Schaden wird Bhengu Beauty davontragen?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I don't know.
[in English] As you heard, PR statements are being made, woh, woh, woh, woh.
I wonder how long people will be talking about it.
translation.de: Wie lange man wohl darüber reden wird?

translation.en: What did I do to deserve these, really?
[in Zulu] I just wanted to thank you.
[in English] For being my friend here for the past four weeks.
translation.de: Du warst mir eine gute Freundin.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You'll get used to this place.
[in English] Even the royal bitchness herself.
But, it's good to have a new friend around here.
translation.de: Es ist gut, eine neue Freundin zu haben.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Where are you off to?
[in English] Partners are freaked out after last night.
translation.de: Die Partner sind nach gestern nervös.

translation.en: I need to make a few calls.
[in Sotho] I'll ask Regina to bring some coffee to the study.
translation.de: Ich lasse Regina Kaffee ins Arbeitszimmer bringen.

translation.en: [in English] I'm actually going to the office.
[in Sotho] It's Saturday. I've arranged a relaxing spa treatment.
translation.de: Es ist Samstag. Ich habe ein Wellness-Paket gebucht.

translation.en: [in English] I'll be back for dinner.
[Zinhle] How's everything with you?
[in Zulu] Yesterday you seemed like you were a little sad.
translation.de: Gestern hast du etwas traurig gewirkt.

translation.en: [in English] You know what it's like with Grace.
translation.de: Du weißt, wie es mit Grace ist.

translation.en: "Smile, dear, we're in public."
It's exhausting.
What's it like being a second wife?
translation.de: Wie ist es, eine zweite Frau zu sein?

translation.en: I wouldn't recommend it,
but what I do recommend is some wine with these chocolates.
translation.de: Aber ich würde etwas Wein zu diesen Pralinen empfehlen.

translation.en: Hmm? Stolen from Grace's collection, of course.
[chuckles] It's not even midday yet.
But it is the weekend, right?
[woman] I'm coming.
Hi! I missed you so much.
translation.de: Hallo! Du hast mir so gefehlt.

translation.en: I'll bet you did.
Of course.
Oh, babe, I heard about the launch.
translation.de: Liebster, ich habe von dem Event gehört.

translation.en: Shh. I'm not here for that. No?
Oh. Okay.
[Don] I've got something for you.
-You do? -Yes.
It's so beautiful! Thank you.
-[Don] Wait, babe… -Hmm?
[Don] Stop.
-What? -Call an ambulance.
What do you mean? What's going on?
translation.de: Was meinst du? Was ist los?

translation.en: -Stop… -Oh my God, what's wrong? Are you okay?
Call an ambulance.
[Ruby] Babe, what's wrong? Okay.
[in Sotho] I don't know. Grace doesn't want me to go.
translation.de: Ich weiß es nicht. Grace will nicht, dass ich gehe.

translation.en: She took… I have to go, I'll call you back.
translation.de: Sie hat… Ich muss auflegen. Ich rufe dich zurück.

translation.en: [in English] Does… Does Mam' Grace need me?
No, um…
Would you like to grab something to eat?
translation.de: Möchtest du mit mir essen gehen?

translation.en: I figured you could use an escape.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du musst mal raus.

translation.en: Ah. Thanks, but I'm going to sleep early.
translation.de: Danke, aber ich werde früh schlafen gehen.

translation.en: Of course. Um… yeah, just shout if you need anything.
translation.de: Natürlich… Ruf mich, wenn du was brauchst.

translation.en: [in Sotho] That's the spot.
[in English] No, man.
Oh, Noni. Eish!
Yes?
Where is he?
[in Sotho] We're here for Don Benghu. Where is he?
translation.de: Wir wollen zu Don Bhengu. Wo ist er?

translation.en: -[in English] Is he okay? -With you in a second.
[Linda] Please, just tell us.
Hey! When I talk to you, you listen!
-Where's my husband? -Mama, she's gonna get to us.
translation.de: -Wo ist mein Mann? -Sie hilft uns gleich.

translation.en: Is there a doctor or someone we can talk to?
translation.de: Können wir mit einem Arzt reden?

translation.en: [in Sotho] What kind of service is this?
You're a private hospital and we're waiting in reception?
translation.de: Das ist ein Privatkrankenhaus, und wir müssen warten?

translation.en: -[in English] Where's my husband? -[in Tswana] Sorry, ma'am. Come with me.
translation.de: Wo ist mein Mann? Tut mir leid. Kommen Sie.

translation.en: [in English] Just tell us if he's okay.
[in Zulu] Sis' Regina, where's everyone?
[in Xhosa] They're all at the hospital. Bab' Don had a heart attack.
translation.de: Im Krankenhaus. Don hatte einen Herzinfarkt.

translation.en: -[in Tswana] He's in surgery right now. -[Linda in English] How long will it take?
translation.de: Er wird gerade operiert. Wie lange dauert das?

translation.en: He has a history of coronary artery disease.
When can we talk to the doctor?
[in Tswana] I'll have more information after the surgery.
translation.de: Nach der OP kann ich mehr sagen.

translation.en: [in English] Excuse me.
Okay guys, whoa. It's just a little scare, okay.
translation.de: Ok, hört zu, das ist nur ein kleiner Schreckmoment.

translation.en: Dad is still young.
This stays right here. We've had enough PR disasters already.
translation.de: Das bleibt unter uns. Wir haben schon genug PR-Probleme.

translation.en: [Ndu] Mama, who cares about PR?
Dad just has a heart attack. Ndumiso!
[in Sotho] We can't have people speculating.
Phila, find out who he was with at the office when this happened.
translation.de: Phila, finde heraus, wer mit ihm im Büro war.

translation.en: They can't talk.
[in English] Done.
[Grace in Sotho] Linda.
-[in English] What? -[Grace] It's all your fault.
[in Sotho] Your carelessness…
[in English] Are you fucking kidding, Grace Mama, come on, that's unfair.
translation.de: -Ist das dein Ernst, Grace? -Mama, das ist unfair.

translation.en: Linda, she didn't mean that.
Of course I did.
[Grace in Sotho] What are you doing here?
Sis' Regina told me what had happened.
translation.de: Regina erzählte mir, was passiert ist.

translation.en: [in English] I thought I'd bring some snacks.
I doubt anyone is hungry.
Thank you.
It's like you read my mind. I'm famished.
translation.de: Du kannst wohl Gedanken lesen. Ich bin am Verhungern.

translation.en: [Zinhle] How's Bab' Don?
[Ndu] Um, still in surgery.
What is it?
He wasn't in the office.
His driver insisted he was there.
[Phila] They found him at the company penthouse.
translation.de: Sie fanden ihn im Penthouse der Firma.

translation.en: Was he alone?
I don't know.
Hey, this looks good. Is this you?
translation.de: Das sieht köstlich aus. Sind die von dir?

translation.en: -It's the least I could do. -Thank you.
You can go.
And don't you dare tell anyone about this.
translation.de: Wag es nicht, jemandem davon zu erzählen.

translation.en: Let me know if you need anything else.
translation.de: Sagt Bescheid, wenn noch was ist.

translation.en: [Thando] Thanks.
Oh yeah, um… let me walk you out.
translation.de: Ach ja, ich bringe dich noch raus.

translation.en: No, no, it's fine.
Stay with everyone. I'll be okay.
-Hey. -Coffee?
Thank you.
You know that…
[in Xhosa] my father…
[in English] I don't have any family.
[in Zulu] But that's not true.
[in English] Ndu and Phila, they have Grace, and…
translation.de: Ndu und Phila haben Grace und…

translation.en: -[Thando] But you've got me. -Yeah.
[Thando] No matter what, Grace cannot get rid of you.
translation.de: Was auch passiert, Grace wird dich nicht los.

translation.en: And you? [sniffs]
Well, it wouldn't be the worst thing, right?
[in Zulu] Your father is going to make it through.
Don't worry.
Shit.
[Thando] What?
Bhengu boys, your father's going to need a lot of support at the office.
translation.de: Bhengu-Jungs, euer Vater braucht jetzt viel Unterstützung im Büro.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Ma, can we stop talking about business for a second?
[in English] How are you? We could lose Dad.
translation.de: Wie geht es dir? Dad könnte sterben.

translation.en: Okay, hold on. We're not going to lose him.
translation.de: Ok, warte mal. Er wird nicht sterben.

translation.en: I mean… But he is right. Maybe we can cool it on the business talk.
translation.de: Aber er hat recht. Wir müssen nicht nur übers Geschäft reden.

translation.en: Your father's going to need a successor sooner than later.
translation.de: Euer Vater braucht bald einen Nachfolger.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Think Linda's just "chilling" right now?
translation.de: Denkt ihr, Linda ruht sich aus?

translation.en: [in English] If that happens, then he's going to choose me.
translation.de: Wenn das passiert, wird er mich wählen.

translation.en: Someone leaked the news of Dad all over social media.
translation.de: Es ist überall in den sozialen Medien.

translation.en: -What? -They said he's dying.
What did I say to all of you?
[in Sotho] I said do not speak to the press!
translation.de: Ich sagte, redet nicht mit der Presse!

translation.en: Who was it?
[in English] Who said something, guys? Who?
[Linda] Maybe it's Zinhle.
-Did you say-- -She's always around, so it makes sense.
translation.de: Ok. Sie ist immer da. Das ergibt Sinn.

translation.en: Maybe someone heard us at reception.
Look, I will talk to the board, okay.
translation.de: Ich rede mit dem Vorstand, ok?

translation.en: And we'll make sure that we…
[in Sotho] Can we see him?
[in Tswana] Yes, you can. But he's still resting.
translation.de: Ja. Aber er ruht sich noch aus.

translation.en: [in English] To help with recovery. So bear that in mind.
translation.de: Er braucht Ruhe. Denken Sie dran.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Don't you ever scare us like that again.
[Linda in Xhosa] Dad, please hold on.
Please, I still need you.
[Grace] Linda.
[in English] Thank you.
Well, I know that you're gonna be out of here in a couple of days. So…
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass du in ein paar Tagen hier rauskommst, also…

translation.en: [Ndu] Stay strong, Dad.
We love you.
Get well, Ngcolosi.
Excuse me, hi, did I not leave my phone here?
translation.de: Verzeihung, liegt mein Handy hier irgendwo?

translation.en: [Linda] This is a curse.
[sighs] And this is my cue to go to bed.
translation.de: Das ist mein Zeichen, ins Bett zu gehen.

translation.en: Good night, everybody. Thank you.
If it isn't a curse, what is it?
translation.de: Wenn es kein Fluch ist, was dann?

translation.en: First the launch…
translation.de: Erst das Event und jetzt Dad.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] …and now Dad. This is a curse.
translation.de: Erst das Event und jetzt Dad. Das ist ein Fluch.

translation.en: -[in English] It's not a curse. -Uh-huh. Thank you.
But it is an opportunity.
-Guys, we've been wasting our time… -Ndumiso.
[in Sotho] It's not time for one of your sermons. Go to bed.
translation.de: Wir brauchen keine Predigt. Geh ins Bett.

translation.en: Why are you up?
I was worried. How is Bab' Don doing?
translation.de: Ich war besorgt. Wie geht es Bab' Don?

translation.en: [in English] That's not for you to worry about.
[in Sotho] Go to sleep.
[Ndu in English] She's just trying to be nice, Mom.
translation.de: Sie will nur nett sein, Mom.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Did you tell anyone about Don's heart attack?
translation.de: Hast du jemandem von Dons Herzinfarkt erzählt?

translation.en: No, Mam' Grace. My phone's been off the whole night.
translation.de: Nein, Mam' Grace. Mein Handy war aus.

translation.en: [in English] Good.
Oh, that cleansing thing… you can go.
translation.de: Und geh ruhig zu deiner Leichenwaschung.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] Some of these vultures.
[in Sotho] They wish their cards read "Rest in Peace."
translation.de: Sie würden lieber "ruhe in Frieden" schreiben.

translation.en: Goodness!
You'd swear I'm the one who had a heart attack.
translation.de: Als hätte ich den Herzinfarkt gehabt.

translation.en: Get rid of these flowers.
Justice… were you on duty when my husband had a heart attack?
translation.de: Justice, waren Sie im Dienst, als mein Mann den Herzinfarkt hatte?

translation.en: Who was he with?
[in Sotho] Hey, bro.
-Yay! -[in English] I made it.
What up, though?
[in Sotho] I missed you.
I'm here now.
I thought I'd have to drag you back home. Hmm?
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich muss dich nach Hause schleifen.

translation.en: [in English] No. There's no need. Okay.
[in Sotho] Let's go inside. Makhosi Mnisi is waiting.
translation.de: Gehen wir rein. Makhosi Mnisi wartet.

translation.en: -[Zinhle] This feels so final. -Yeah.
[in Sotho] We have to stay strong for her.
translation.de: Wir müssen stark für sie sein.

translation.en: [Zinhle in Zulu] Greetings, Makhosi.
I still need to see other people. You're wasting my time.
translation.de: Ich habe andere Termine. Du verschwendest meine Zeit.

translation.en: [Zinhle] I'm sorry. But I have a bottle of whiskey for you.
translation.de: Es tut mir leid. Aber ich habe Whiskey für dich.

translation.en: Good girl. Where's my whiskey?
Let's get to work.
[in Xhosa] Praise God.
When did you wake up?
I've been up for a while now.
How are you feeling?
[in English] I'm so fit, I could run a marathon.
[in Xhosa] I've brought someone to see you.
[in English] Who's that?
[in Xhosa] Goodness.
[in English] What a pleasant surprise.
[in Xhosa] I'm glad to see you awake.
translation.de: Wie schön, dass du wach bist.

translation.en: I brought a few traditional things.
[in Zulu] These Western doctors also need help.
[in Xhosa] Now we are talking.
[Makhosi in Zulu] Ancestors of the Selepe family,
the Elders and Protectors of this family,
translation.de: die Ältesten und Beschützer der Familie,

translation.en: I ask that you allow me as a healer
translation.de: Ich bitte euch, mich als Heilerin dienen zu lassen,

translation.en: to cleanse these kids.
translation.de: um die Wunden dieser Kinder zu waschen.

translation.en: To cleanse them because there isn't an elder to do so.
translation.de: Ich muss sie waschen, weil keine Ältesten da sind.

translation.en: Please allow me to remove this dark cloud that follows them.
translation.de: Bitte erlaubt mir, die dunkle Wolke über ihnen zu entfernen.

translation.en: And to remove these dark spirits that follow them.
translation.de: Und die dunklen Geister, die ihnen folgen.

translation.en: Spirits that took their sister, Amahle.
translation.de: Geister, die ihre Schwester Amahle nahmen.

translation.en: Please allow me to do this so that their paths can be cleared.
translation.de: Bitte erlaubt mir, das zu tun, damit ihre Wege wieder frei sind.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] It's strong.
Can you feel it?
I can feel it working already.
-That's good. -[clears throat]
-That's what we want to hear. -[chuckles]
[in Sotho] I didn't know you called for Simphiwe [in Xhosa] I brought her, Grace.
translation.de: -Ich wusste nicht, dass sie kommt. -Ich brachte sie her, Grace.

translation.en: [in Sotho] Linda, you know your father's treatments can't…
[in English] I know what's good for me, Grace.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was mir guttut, Grace.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] Thank you, my child. You can go.
translation.de: Danke, mein Kind. Ihr könnt gehen.

translation.en: -[Linda] All right. -Simphiwe.
You've really helped me.
[in English] We should be more careful. [Don] Sit down.
What did the doctor say? I said sit down.
translation.de: -Was hat der Arzt gesagt? -Ich sagte, setz dich.

translation.en: There's going to be a few changes in our lives.
translation.de: Es wird ein paar Veränderungen geben.

translation.en: I need more children.
[Grace in Sotho] You know I can't have more kids.
translation.de: Ich kann keine Kinder mehr bekommen.

translation.en: [in English] Another heart attack and I'm dead.
I don't have time to waste, so I'm taking another wife.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Zeit zu verlieren. Ich heirate noch eine Frau.

translation.en: I've already found someone who'll give me children.
translation.de: Es gibt eine, die mir Kinder schenkt.

translation.en: You can't make a decision like that without my permission!
translation.de: Das geht nicht ohne meine Erlaubnis.

translation.en: No, I don't need your permission.
[in Sotho] I allowed my husband to marry you so he could have his entertainment at home.
translation.de: Ich ließ ihn dich heiraten, damit er sich daheim amüsieren kann.

translation.en: Why is he looking elsewhere when you're here?
[in English] What's that?
Do you want to go and ask him yourself?
[in Zulu] You heard what he said.
He wants more children, and you and I both know I couldn't…
translation.de: Er will mehr Kinder, und wir wissen, dass ich nicht…

translation.en: [in English] Shut up! Thando, just shut up!
translation.de: Halt die Klappe! Thando, sei still!

translation.en: Smile, dear, we're in public.
translation.de: Lächeln, wir sind in der Öffentlichkeit.

translation.en: [Ruby] Excuse me!
[in Zulu] Who are you?
[Grace in English] You know exactly who I am.
translation.de: Du weißt genau, wer ich bin.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Who are you?
I'm Ruby.
[in Sotho] Isn't that a whore's name?
translation.de: Noni, ist das nicht der Name einer Hure?

translation.en: [in Zulu] No, it's my real name.
translation.de: Nein, das ist mein richtiger Name.

translation.en: [in English] Test her.
Test me for what?
I'm not pregnant. Why would…
I'm calling security. No, you're not!
Your choice.
You want to do this sleeping or awake?
translation.de: Willst du dabei schlafen oder wach sein?

translation.en: I'm not the bad guy here.
You're the one sleeping with my husband.
We can do this painlessly if you want.
Good girl.
Now go with the lovely nurse.
[in Sotho] Why are you laughing?
-Nana? -[groans]
[in Sotho] Are you okay?
I'm fine.
For Chancer.
For helping me win the online competition
and the pictures at the launch.
No problem.
How're you coping?
How are you coping?
You're all alone here now.
translation.de: Du bist jetzt ganz allein hier.

translation.en: I'm fine.
I don't have to see Grace and Don every day.
translation.de: Ich muss nicht jeden Tag Grace und Don sehen.

translation.en: I managed to get into Don's room at the hospital.
translation.de: Ich habe es in Dons Krankenzimmer geschafft.

translation.en: He looked so weak.
He looked nothing like the scary man from our childhood.
translation.de: Nicht wie der furchterregende Mann aus unserer Kindheit.

translation.en: I wanted to finish him off.
You're not a murderer.
I know.
He has to live…
so that he sees us destroy everything that he loves.
translation.de: …damit er sieht, wie wir alles zerstören, was er liebt.

translation.en: I know it's only been six months since we lost Amahle.
translation.de: Es ist erst sechs Monate her, seit Amahle gestorben ist.

translation.en: If you need time…
-Time? -If you want to back out…
No!
I don't need time. This has to be done.
translation.de: Ich brauche keine Zeit. Es muss getan werden.

translation.en: Did you get what I asked for?
I did, but you don't need it.
translation.de: Ja, aber du brauchst es nicht.

translation.en: I do.
[in English] Just in case things go wrong.
[in Sotho] Thank you.
[in English] For doing this with me.
[in Sotho] We're in this together.
[in Zulu] He say he'll marry you?
How old are you?
[in English] Twenty-two, 23, 24--
Twenty-one.
Twenty what?
-Twenty-one. -Twenty-one?
You're a baby.
If you marry him, you're going to be wife number three.
Last on the list.
[in Zulu] He'll get you pregnant as soon as he can.
translation.de: Er wird dich im Nu schwängern.

translation.en: [in English] That doesn't mean he'll stop sleeping with other girls.
translation.de: Das heißt nicht, dass er nicht mit anderen schläft.

translation.en: [in Zulu] There are lots of Rubys.
By the time you turn 23…
[in English] You'll feel trapped. You know why?
translation.de: …wirst du dich gefangen fühlen. Weißt du, warum?

translation.en: [in Zulu] Because the Bhengu name will not be tainted by divorce.
translation.de: Weil der Name Bhengu nicht durch Scheidung besudelt wird.

translation.en: Goodness.
[in English] Negative.
Perfect.
Now, if you don't want to suffer for the rest of your life,
translation.de: Wenn du nicht für den Rest deines Lebens leiden willst,

translation.en: you'll say and do exactly what I tell you.
translation.de: dann sag und mach genau das, was ich dir sage.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Understood?
[in Xhosa] You're back.
[in English] Is Mam' Grace around? I wanted to tell her that I'm back.
translation.de: Ist Mam 'Grace da? Ich wollte mich zurückmelden.

translation.en: [in Xhosa] She's not here.
[in English] Join me for dinner. Otherwise, all that food will go to waste,
translation.de: Iss was mit mir. Es wäre schade um das Essen. Regina hatte erwartet, dass alle hier sind.

translation.en: and Regina was expecting everyone to be here.
translation.de: Regina hatte erwartet, dass alle hier sind.

translation.en: Come. Come sit down.
Um, so, how was the cleansing?
As good as these things get.
-Do you mind me asking why-- -How's your Dad?
Oh, he's coming back tomorrow.
He's awake?
[chuckles] Yeah. Actually, he's doing well.
[Zinhle] Who took these?
[Ndu] Oh, I did, in art school.
[Zinhle] They're really good.
Yeah. I'm actually looking for something that I can print out and frame
translation.de: Ja. Ich suche etwas, das ich ausdrucken und einrahmen kann.

translation.en: for Dad as a welcome-home gift.
-Uh… [laughs] -[in Zulu] Is this you?
[Ndu in English] Yeah. Um, that's from two years ago.
translation.de: Ja, das war vor zwei Jahren.

translation.en: When I used to copy everything Phila used to do,
before the accident.
What accident?
Check this out.
I crashed my Porsche.
They had to cut me out. It took two months to recover.
translation.de: Ich wurde rausgeschnitten. Zwei Monate Genesung.

translation.en: I remember thinking to myself, I could have died without living a meaningful life.
translation.de: Ich hätte sterben können, ohne je etwas Bedeutendes getan zu haben.

translation.en: Wow.
Now I spend my time looking for the deeper meaning in life, you know.
translation.de: Jetzt suche ich die ganze Zeit nach dem tieferen Sinn des Lebens.

translation.en: [chuckles] Still looking.
I have to go.
Sorry, I'm actually not that hungry.
I'm home.
What the hell is this?
What's this?
I'm leaving, Don. I can't do this anymore.
translation.de: Ich gehe, Don. Ich kann das nicht mehr.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-Come here. -No.
This repulsive relationship is over.
Repulsive?
You're old enough to be my father,
and I deserve way more than an arrangement.
translation.de: Und ich verdiene mehr als ein Arrangement.

translation.en: [Don] An arrangement?
I want to marry you, start a family.
translation.de: Ich will dich heiraten, eine Familie gründen.

translation.en: You already have a family.
Please don't… don't go.
I'm sorry I have to go,
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich muss es tun.

translation.en: and please delete my number.
Ruby.
[in Sotho] Cut them into smaller pieces.
We don't want him to choke after surviving a heart attack.
translation.de: Er solle nicht ersticken, nachdem er den Herzinfarkt überlebte.

translation.en: [in English] Speaking of, are we picking him up?
[in Sotho] No, he said his driver will bring him back.
translation.de: Nein, sein Fahrer holt ihn ab.

translation.en: Morning, Mam' Grace.
[in English] Zinhle. Looking good.
[in Sotho] Thank you for letting me go to the cleansing yesterday.
translation.de: Danke, dass ich gestern zu der Waschung gehen durfte.

translation.en: [in English] Nice hair.
[in Sotho] The styles I arranged…
you've switched them up, huh?
I like the outfit too. Turn around so I can see.
translation.de: Das Outfit gefällt mir auch. Umdrehen.

translation.en: Take a selfie and send it to Sonto in social media.
translation.de: Mach ein Selfie und schick es Sonto vom Marketing.

translation.en: [in English] And touch up your make-up. You're sweating.
translation.de: Frisch dein Make-up auf. Du schwitzt.

translation.en: I'll do that.
[in Sotho] You know, in my day… you had to be taller and lighter…
translation.de: Zu meiner Zeit musste man größer und heller sein,

translation.en: to be considered beautiful.
[Phila in English] You can't just say things like that.
translation.de: Mama, so etwas sagt man nicht.

translation.en: [Grace] I'm just saying.
[in Sotho] When she won the competition, I was this close to denying the results.
translation.de: Als sie den Wettbewerb gewann, hätte ich fast Einspruch erhoben.

translation.en: [Phila in English] Yeah, she's not your typical model,
translation.de: Ja, sie ist kein typisches Model,

translation.en: but she is beautiful and she is likable.
translation.de: aber sie ist schön und liebenswert.

translation.en: You're right.
There's something recognizable about her.
[Phila] Yeah?
[in Sotho] Give me the knife. Let me show you.
translation.de: Gib mir das Messer. Ich zeige es dir.

translation.en: Like this.
[in English] You can let go, Nana.
[in Sotho] They will pay.
I'll make sure of it.
[sniffling] Amahle. Amahle. Amahle!
